Enumerations

enum  CSL_XbarIrq
 Enumeration that contains all possible interrupt source IDs as inputs to each irq crossbar instance.

Detailed Description

Function Documentation

void CSL_xbarDmaConfigure ( CSL_XbarDmaCpuId  cpuId,
uint32_t  dmaNumIdx,
CSL_XbarDma  xbarDma 
)

API to connect any connection between an dma event source to the dma channel in the DMA instance.
.

Parameters
cpuIdIt can take one of the value from enum CSL_XbarDmaCpuId
dmaNumIdxCrossbar index
xbarDmaIt can take one of the dma event id from enum CSL_XbarDma
Returns
None
Note
To connect,pass corresponding interrupt value from xbar_irq_t. To disconnect,pass IRQ_XBAR_RSVD as xbarIrq.
void CSL_xbarIrqConfigure ( CSL_XbarIrqCpuId  cpuId,
uint32_t  irqNumIdx,
CSL_XbarIrq  xbarIrq 
)

API to connect/disconnect any connection between an interrupt source and a processor in the IRQ XBAR.
.

Parameters
cpuIdIt can take one of the value from enum CSL_XbarIrqCpuId
irqNumIdxCrossbar index
xbarIrqIt can take one of the interrupt id from enum CSL_XbarIrq
Returns
None
Note
To connect,pass corresponding interrupt value from xbar_irq_t. To disconnect,pass IRQ_XBAR_RSVD as xbarIrq.
